decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to use a combination of card draw, counterspells, and fog effects to stall the game and prevent the opponent from dealing damage. By consistently drawing cards, ramping up mana, and using fog effects, the player aims to survive long enough to assemble and execute a powerful combo that will either win the game outright or put them in a winning position. The deck prioritizes controlling the pace of the game and setting up a winning combo rather than rushing for a quick win.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by using Urzatron lands to generate large amounts of mana, allowing for powerful spells and abilities to be cast. It aims to control the board through card advantage, counterspells, and creature removal, while also utilizing flicker effects to reuse valuable ETB abilities. The deck includes a variety of utility cards to help handle different situations and maintain board presence. The goal is to outlast opponents through attrition and overwhelm them with powerful late-game threats.
